intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: This is it... Fort Jinya. This is essentially Hoshido's front line. It's rumored to be impregnable. Seizing it is tantamount to conquering Hoshido. We must not fail.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: *sigh* Of course it's impregnable. Why is it never easy?

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: We should brace ourselves. We will likely be battling people we know in there.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I'm ready. We've made it this far... There's no turning back now. It's just like Xander said. No matter who we lose...or who we end up hurting... We must do what we must do to bring peace to this war-torn land.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: You're right. Even if I must defeat the siblings I grew up with... It is for a higher purpose. Neither of us should regret the events to come. We're in this together, Corrin. I will follow you to the end.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thank you, Azura. Your support gives me strength. Well, there’s no reason to postpone this any longer. The soldiers inside have likely already realized we're here. We should attack first, before they do. Let's go.

intro.speaker: Yukimura
intro.line: Lady Sakura, what are you still doing here? You must escape! NOW!

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Wh-what's the matter, Yukimura? You're out of breath!

intro.speaker: Yukimura
intro.line: Milady, you must stop healing our soldiers and retreat. There isn't a moment to lose. Lord/Lady Corrin and his/her army are outside the fort, preparing for battle.

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: Corrin's here? ...I see. Then I will j-join the fight.

intro.speaker: Yukimura
intro.line: You don't know what you're saying. You need to get back to the castle right—

intro.speaker: Sakura
intro.line: I'm sorry, Yukimura. I know you're only looking out for me. But I'm no longer a powerless princess. I will f-fight for my kingdom. I refuse to leave these soldiers behind and be the only one who escapes! Please, Yukimura. P-please try to understand.

intro.speaker: Yukimura
intro.line: Lady Sakura... *sigh* My word, what to do? Lord Ryoma would kill me for this, but... If it means that much to you to stay, then I shall not force you to retreat. But only if you allow me to arrange for your protection. We shall fight together.

boss.speaker: Hana
boss.line: I swear that my sword will not rest until Lady Sakura is safe!

boss.speaker: Hana
boss.line: Lady Sakura, I'm so very sorry... I've lost... Forgive me...

boss.speaker: Subaki
boss.line: I will defend this fort, as well as Lady Sakura's honor!

boss.speaker: Subaki
boss.line: I actually...lost...? How clumsy...

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: I won't let you pass! The people of Hoshido are too p-precious to me!

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: I failed... I guess I'm still just a p-powerless princess...

boss.speaker: Yukimura
boss.line: My brain against your brawn... Let us see which one comes out on top!

boss.speaker: Yukimura
boss.line: Lady Mikoto... I am sorry...

boss.speaker: Hana
boss.line: You're finally here, Lord/Lady Corrin! I am Hana, Lady Sakura's retainer. I'll have your head on a platter!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Huh?!

boss.speaker: Hana
boss.line: I could never, ever forgive you after what you did to Lady Mikoto! You tried to destroy Hoshido, and you made Lady Sakura sad... Do you have any idea how many nights she cried herself to sleep over you?! That's why I won't be satisfied... Not until I kill you myself!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Um...are you crying?

boss.speaker: Hana
boss.line: Sh-shut up! Samurai don't cry! You're just trying to distract me! I won't cry and I won't lose! You won't hurt my beloved Sakura ever again! You absolutely WILL NOT make it past me. You won't, you won't, you won't!!

boss.speaker: Subaki
boss.line: Lord/Lady Corrin, I presume? The sweet, wonderful, mysterious-yet-charming big brother/sister of Lady Sakura? It's an honor to finally make your acquaintance.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Erm... Come again?

boss.speaker: Subaki
boss.line: Oh, Lady Sakura said those things about you after you two met. She wouldn't stop saying those things, as it were. Even after you left. As her retainer, I make it my business to remember such details.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Sakura... She really said all that?

boss.speaker: Subaki
boss.line: Yes. She seems to have nothing but the highest opinion of you. She was devastated after you betrayed her.

boss.speaker: Subaki
boss.line: Worry not. All will be as it should once I send you to your grave. I cannot bear to ever see that sad look in her eyes again. The one YOU caused. So, shall we begin?

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: Corrin!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: Sakura... I didn’t expect you to be here. But if you insist on blocking our way, I won't back down.

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: I know... And I know I probably can't w-win against you, either. But as a princess, I have to at least try to protect my kingdom! So, r-ready your sword. It's time to battle!

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: As you wish.

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: This is the first time we'll really be fighting, B-brother/S-sister. I wish...we were fighting side by side instead...

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: Azura!

boss.speaker: Azura
boss.line: Sakura... I'm surprised to see you here. When did you learn to fight?

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: After M-Mother died, I began training, so I could protect the ones I love. I won't let anyone get past me - not even you!

boss.speaker: Azura
boss.line: I see. I always knew you would grow into a strong woman. I'm happy to see you like this, Sakura. Whatever happens, I'm proud of you.

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: Azura... *sniff... sniff... * My... sister...

boss.speaker: Azura
boss.line: Don't cry, Sakura. This is a battlefield, and we are at war. Ready your weapon, dear Sister. Show me how strong you've become.

boss.speaker: Sakura
boss.line: *sniff* OK! Let's b-begin!

boss.speaker: Yukimura
boss.line: I will defend this fort and Hoshido, until death if I must. Though seeing us fight would have destroyed Lady Mikoto, it must be so.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: This is not how I would have wanted this to end either, Yukimura. But here we are... So brace yourself!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Listen well, Hoshidan army. This fort belongs to Nohr now! To fight back would be futile. Throw down your weapons and surrender! Do as I say, and the lives of all remaining soldiers will be spared!

end.speaker: Yukimura
end.line: Bah! I'm afraid we've been outmatched. We have no choice... None who remain are in any shape to continue this battle. The wisest path open to us is to surrender and live to fight another day...

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: I'm s-so sorry... I should have... If only I were...

end.speaker: Yukimura
end.line: Nonsense, Lady Sakura. You fought bravely, I am quite proud of you. The same goes for you two, Subaki and Hana.

end.speaker: Subaki
end.line: Yukimura... This cannot be happening...

end.speaker: Hana
end.line: *sniff* We really lost...didn't we?

end.speaker: Yukimura
end.line: Yes, I'm afraid so. But we are still alive. As long as we live, so does our cause. Let us lay down our weapons now. It's time to surrender. There's no reason for any more blood to be shed on these stones.

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: *sniff* Y-you're right Yukimura. It's over...

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Hoshidan army! This is the last time I will repeat myself. The Nohrian army has claimed this fort for our own. Surrender now and—

end.speaker: Yukimura
end.line: We heard you the first time, Crown Prince of Nohr.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Then you should have responded sooner, lest I mistake your silence for cowardice. Or do you still intend to fight the inevitable?

end.speaker: Yukimura
end.line: No, we do not. You have won. The Hoshidan army surrenders. All remaining soldiers have been instructed to lay down their weapons. We do so in good faith that you will, at the least, spare our princess...

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: You have made the right choice. Your fallen queen would be proud. In return, I promise that your princess and your troops will be spared. Soldiers! Bind the prisoners! But under no circumstances are they to be harmed!

end.speaker: Nohrian
end.line: Yes, milord!

end.speaker: Yukimura
end.line: Ugh...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Sakura, Yukimura... Please forgive me. I know it seems cruel, but this is the only way to end this awful war once and for all. I know you don't understand now... But perhaps one day...

end.speaker: Hoshidan
end.line: GYAAAAAA!!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Huh?!

end.speaker: Hans
end.line: HA! Is this really all you Hoshidan rats are capable of? Pathetic!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Hans! What are you doing here?!

end.speaker: Yukimura
end.line: What is the meaning of this?! You swore to spare our soldiers' lives if we surrendered!

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: No, please! I need to heal them right away or th-they'll... Please untie my hands! I swear I won't try to escape! PLEASE, let me help them!!

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: I'm afraid I cannot allow that, princess of Hoshido.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Iago!

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Ah, if it isn't Prince/Princess Corrin! My, how easily you seized this fort. What a truly impressive display of brute force! King Garon will certainly shower praise upon you for this grand triumph.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: I could not care less about praise right now, Iago. What is the meaning of this?!

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: We were just SO worried about our young prince/princess! We came to help. Now that we're here, just leave the messy part to us. General Hans here is all too eager to put these sorry Hoshidans out of their misery.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: No, you monster! Those soldiers already surrendered! The battle is won! I will not allow you to take the lives of unarmed soldiers. Stand down, NOW.

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: Oh dear, how awkward. You may wish for us to stand down, but you see...

end.speaker: Hans
end.line: Die, die, DIE!!

end.speaker: Hoshidan
end.line: AAAHHHH!!

end.speaker: Hoshidan
end.line: GAAAHHHH!!

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: NOOO! Please, stop it! Don't kill anyone else—I beg of you! *sob* Please...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: That's ENOUGH, Iago! I order you to stop this madness!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Damn you, insolent fool! Stop with this cruelty now, or so help me, I will kill you myself!

end.speaker: Iago
end.line: What?! You can't be serious, Lord Xander!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: I am not known to make light of serious matters, Iago. I refuse to harbor a cruel and spineless general in the proud Nohrian army. As crown prince, I will not hesitate to strike you down for the honor of Nohr.
Not today, Xander. Stand down.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: No... It cannot be!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Father...

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: My orders have been given. I will not allow anyone, even my own child, to disobey.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: But, Father! Xander was just—

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: Did I not make myself clear?! Disobey and die!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: ... ...Y-yes, Father.

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: ...Under...stood.

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: Good. Let that be the end of it.

end.speaker: Yukimura
end.line: Liars! Cowards! Filthy Nohrian scum! I will never forgive you for this! NEVER! You're all monsters! Demons! DEVILS!!

end.speaker: Sakura
end.line: *sob* H-how could this...happen... They were supposed to be safe... This is... It's just too cruel!

end.speaker: Garon
end.line: You've done well, my children. Hoshido is as good as conquered. I am proud of you.
